title: Handle Itinerary Change on a Cruise
description: Due to a storm, a cruise ship must skip a scheduled port of call. The cruise line needs to inform passengers and adjust accounts.

tasks.description: Broadcast an announcement to all passengers onboard about the itinerary change and the reason.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully sends a notification to all passenger cabins and the cruise line's mobile app.

tasks.description: Identify all passengers who had pre-booked shore excursions for the cancelled port.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a list of all affected excursion bookings.

tasks.description: Automatically refund all charges for the cancelled shore excursions to the passengers' onboard accounts.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully processes a bulk refund for all cancelled tours.
